title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using valid credentials and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Fill the registration form with valid email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the user receives a confirmation message and account is created.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify user login is successful with correct email and password and session is established.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard and token/session is established.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid password and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email with an incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify that an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Farm Creation with Valid Polygon Boundary
description: Verify that a user can create a farm by drawing a polygon boundary and the system validates the area correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to create new farm page.
Draw a polygon boundary within allowed area constraints.
Fill in farm details like name and location.
Submit the farm creation form.
Verify farm is created and polygon boundary is saved and displayed on the map.

title: Farm Creation Boundary Area Validation
description: Ensure system rejects farm polygon boundary if area exceeds farm area by more than 50%.

steps.description: Navigate to create farm page.
Draw a polygon boundary exceeding 150% of the allowable farm area.
Attempt to submit the farm creation form.
Verify an error or validation message prevents the farm creation.

title: Add Field with Crop and Soil Type Tracking
description: Verify adding a new field with polygon boundary, selecting crop type, and soil type successfully saves the data.

steps.description: Navigate to add new field page within a farm.
Draw field polygon boundary inside the farm limits.
Select crop type and soil type from dropdowns.
Submit the field creation form.
Verify new field is saved with correct boundary, crop, and soil data and visible on maps.

title: Real-Time Satellite Imagery Layer Rendering
description: Validate satellite imagery layers (NDVI, EVI, NDMI, chlorophyll, moisture) are fetched and rendered on 3D terrain correctly with fallbacks.

steps.description: Navigate to satellite imagery dashboard.
Select each imagery layer one by one (NDVI, EVI, NDMI, chlorophyll, moisture).
Verify each layer loads and renders appropriately on the 3D map.
Disable primary EOSDA API to simulate failure.
Verify fallback EOSDA API support activates and imagery layers still load properly.

title: AI Assistant Plant Disease Image Analysis
description: Verify that uploading a plant image triggers multi-provider AI analysis and returns disease diagnosis and treatment advice.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Assistant with plant disease diagnostic feature.
Upload a clear image of a diseased plant leaf.
Verify AI-powered multi-provider analysis is triggered and results are returned.
Verify diagnosis details and treatment advice are displayed to the user.

title: Soil Health Parameter Analysis and Recommendation
description: Check that soil analysis shows accurate NPK, pH, moisture, organic content values and provides tailored fertilization recommendations.

steps.description: Navigate to soil analysis page.
Input or fetch soil data parameters for a selected field.
Verify system calculates and displays correct NPK, pH, moisture, and organic content.
Verify that appropriate fertilization recommendations based on data are shown.

title: AI-Powered Irrigation Scheduling and Recommendations
description: Validate that irrigation recommendations are generated based on integrated soil moisture and weather data.

steps.description: Navigate to irrigation management dashboard.
Ensure soil moisture and current weather data are up to date for the selected field.
Verify AI generates irrigation schedule and watering recommendations accordingly.

title: Early Warning System for Agricultural Risks
description: Validate that the system detects vegetation stress, drought, disease, and temperature risks and issues alerts with severity levels.

steps.description: Simulate or input conditions causing vegetation stress or drought in test environment.
Access the dashboard and early warning alerts section.
Verify an automated alert is generated and displayed with proper severity assessment.

title: AI-Based Crop Yield Prediction Accuracy
description: Check that yield predictions are generated with confidence scores and estimated harvest dates using historical and real-time data.

steps.description: Navigate to yield prediction module for a selected farm or field.
Verify that the system displays crop yield forecasts with confidence scores and harvest date estimates.

title: Weather Data Integration and Display
description: Validate that current weather, 7-day forecast, and weather alerts are accurately fetched and displayed in the UI and linked with farming modules.

steps.description: Navigate to the weather dashboard.
Verify current weather conditions and forecast data are correctly displayed.
Verify that weather alerts appear and are actionable by agricultural modules such as irrigation or warnings.

title: Crop Monitoring Timeline and Health Trend
description: Verify the crop monitoring timeline views the development stages and tracks health scores with trend analytics over time.

steps.description: Navigate to crop monitoring page.
Verify timeline shows crop growth stages clearly.
Verify health scoring is accurate and trends are graphed and updated over growth periods.

title: Reports Export Functionality
description: Check that farm and field reports and analytics can be generated and exported in supported formats.

steps.description: Navigate to reports & analytics section.
Generate a report for specific farm or field data.
Export the report in available formats (PDF, CSV, etc.).
Verify the report exports correctly with all selected data intact.

title: Multi-language Support and Accessibility
description: Verify the UI supports both Arabic and English languages with accurate translations and accessibility features.

steps.description: Switch application language to Arabic and navigate through key modules.
Validate the correctness and completeness of Arabic translations.
Switch application language back to English and verify content.
Verify accessibility features comply with standards (e.g., keyboard navigation, ARIA labels).

title: Map Visualization with Field Boundaries and Analytical Overlays
description: Verify 3D maps properly display farm and field polygons along with satellite and analytical overlays interactively.

steps.description: Navigate to map visualization modules.
Toggle display of field boundaries and satellite analytical overlays.
Ensure polygons are accurate and overlays align correctly on the 3D terrain map.

title: System Health Check for External Services
description: Ensure platform health checks correctly report statuses of EOSDA API, Plant.id AI, Weather API, and sensor integrations.

steps.description: Trigger system health check manually or via scheduled task.
Verify status of each external service is fetched and displayed accurately.
Verify error conditions are reported properly if a service is down.

title: Centralized Error Handling with UI Notification
description: Verify that any client or server errors are caught by error boundaries and logged with user-friendly notifications.

steps.description: Simulate an API failure or client-side UI error.
Verify error boundary catches the error preventing crash.
Verify error is logged and a relevant error message or UI fallback is displayed to the user.

title: Session Timeout and User Logout
description: Verify that user sessions expire after inactivity and users are logged out and redirected to login page.

steps.description: Login to the application and remain inactive until session timeout triggers.
Verify user session is invalidated and user is redirected to the login page.
